pages.text: $(thing)$()Mods change Minecraft's game content in some way, such as to make minor adjustments to the game's mechanics or implement entirely new features. $(br2)Most mods require a $(thing)Modloader$() like $(l:https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge)Forge$() or $(l:https://fabricmc.net/use/installer)Fabric$(). $(br2)$(li)You can find a lot of mods $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods)here$()
And here you will find a few more mods from me :) $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/members/xxrexraptorxx/projects)*shameless self-promotion*$()
